dcterms:description: A dataset containing the Brazilian input-output matrix for the year 2015, which provides information on the statutory incidence of indirect taxes and the first-stage incidence of these taxes across various sectors and products.
dcterms:title: Matriz de Insumo-Produto do Brasil 2015

dcterms:creator: R. Siqueira
J. R. B. Nogueira
E. S. Souza
dcterms:description: A dataset providing estimates of the effective incidence of indirect taxation in Brazil, focusing on the effects of input taxation.
dcterms:title: Estimativas da incidência efetiva da tributação indireta no Brasil

dcterms:creator: R. Siqueira
J. R. B. Nogueira
E. S. Souza
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents effective rates and the distribution of the indirect tax burden among families in Brazil.
dcterms:title: Alíquotas Efetivas e a Distribuição da Carga Tributária Indireta entre as Famílias no Brasil

dcterms:description: A dataset providing estimates of the gross tax burden in Brazil for the year 2019.
dcterms:title: Estimativa da Carga Tributária Bruta no Brasil – 2019
